TopicTitle: Can I transport science from B to C

Articles.Content:
Sorry, did search first but can't find it....

Is it possible to transfer my surface sample from the lander can to my other lander with the heatshield? All science is in the lander without the heatshield..

Thank you!
Kerbals are able to transfer science between capsules - right click on a capsule, and it should give you the option to take the data.
Thanks, did do it the other way around with EVA reports, did not see the option to do it the other way around. Will try it!
And remember to be close enough too.

You can also grab science from any experiment module. Be warned that taking science from either the materials bay or the Goo canister will stop you from being able to take another sample with it. (Exactly the same as what happens when you transmit)
Yes, but I don't think you get science points for "vessel recovered from the surface of X".
